Description:
Detects the load of EvtMuteHook.dll, a key component of SharpEvtHook, a tool that tampers with the Windows event logs

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - SharpEvtMute DLL Load
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where hashes like '%imphash=330768a4f172e10acb6287b87289d83b%'
